oai_dc:dc.dc:title: COVID-19 Mask days as a per cent of state person days
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jacobs, Philip
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This database contains total mask days that resulted from local and state legislative mandates. The fields in this database are: State ID, Non-covered mask days, municipal covered days, county covered days, state covered days, non covered days as a ratio of total person days, municipal covered days as a ratio, county covered days as a ratio, state covered days as a ratio, total number of orders in the state.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Social Sciences
COVID-19 mask orders
